pets.name: Buddy
pets.description: Friendly and energetic, loves to play fetch.

pets.name: Whiskers
pets.description: Very vocal and curious, loves sunbathing.

pets.name: Coco
pets.description: Enjoys whistling tunes and perching on shoulders.

pets.name: Nibbles
pets.description: Timid at first, but very sweet and loves carrots.

pets.name: Rocky
pets.description: Protective and loyal, great with kids.

pets.name: Luna
pets.description: Large and fluffy, enjoys being brushed.

pets.name: Shadow
pets.description: Obedient and intelligent, trained in commands.
